mapPage.introduction: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Dignissimos, soluta. Commodi tempora inventore totam, necessitatibus, iste maiores fugit ad blanditiis libero corrupti voluptatibus culpa fugiat neque aperiam voluptas, incidunt alias?
mapPage.enlargeYourSearch: Expand your search or reset all filters.
mapPage.noGreekOrSemitic: neither in greek, neither in semitic

aside.noSelectedMarker: Select a marker to see details
aside.introContent: This panel allows you to explore in detail the data associated with the point you selected on the map. You will find specific statistics, such as a numerical overview of the divinities or epithets present in the sources, or consult data related to agents, such as their names, activities, and designations. You can also view the sources associated with the selected point, which will be displayed in a table format. This table includes information such as the title of the source, its type, and its date.

tags.label: Map tags
tags.description: These tags will be used to filter the maps in the list of maps. You can choose one or more tags.

divinityInChart.label: Element chart
divinityInChart.description: Choose if you want to display the divinities or the epithets number in the chart.

pointSetName.label: Point set name
pointSetName.description: If you choose to display point sets on different layers, the user will see the point set name in the layer list.

pointColor.label: Point color
pointColor.description: If a color is selected, the points will be displayed in that color. Otherwise, they will appear in brown.

pointIcon.label: Point icon shape
pointIcon.description: If no shape is selected, the points will be displayed as circles.

pointSetForm.isLayeredLabel: Point must be displayed on a different layer

basic.label: Basic
basic.description: 'Elements' filter will be built with the list of all elements from the displayed attestations.

manual.label: Manual
manual.description: 'Elements' filter will be built with the list of all elements from the displayed attestations. The user will be able to select one or more elements from the list. The filter will be displayed as a select/options element.

greatRegion.label: Great region
greatRegion.description: 'Location' filter will display a select/options element with the list of great regions from all displayed attestations.

subRegion.label: Subregion
subRegion.description: 'Location' filter will display a select/options element with the list of subregions from all displayed attestations.

cityName.label: City name
cityName.description: 'Location' filter will display a select/options element with the list of city names from all displayed attestations.

mapFormPage.addFilters: Add user filters to the map
mapFormPage.filterIntroduction: It is possible to add up to 2 filters per card, in addition to the time filter which is always displayed.

locationFilter.label: Location filter
locationFilter.description: Displays a select/options element with the list of sub-regions from all displayed attestations

languageFilter.label: Language filter (Greek or Semitic)
languageFilter.description: Displays two checkboxes with the options 'Greek' and 'Semitic'.

epithetFilter.label: Epithets filter
epithetFilter.description: Displays a select/options element with the list of epithets from all elements of the displayed attestations

divinityNbFilter.label: Divinity number filter
divinityNbFilter.description: Displays a double slider with a minimum and maximum value, defined by the number of divinities in the set of displayed attestations

sourceTypeFilter.label: Source type filter
sourceTypeFilter.description: Displays a select/options element with the list of source types from all displayed attestations

agentActivityFilter.label: Agent activity filter
agentActivityFilter.description: Displays a select/options element with the list of agent activities from all displayed attestations

agentNameFilter.label: Agent name filter
agentNameFilter.description: Displays a select/options element with the list of agent names from all displayed attestations

agentGenderFilter.label: Agent gender filter
agentGenderFilter.description: Displays checkboxes with male, female or nonbinary options

noFilter.label: I don't want to add a filter
noFilter.description: No filter will be added to the map.

mapFormPage.uploadPointsHelp: Help for create a CSV file

form.title: the title
form.subtitle: the subtitle
form.csv: Add a CSV file with map markers
form.uploadTableFr: Add a CSV file with a table in language 1
form.uploadTableEn: Add a CSV file with a table in language 2
form.scrollMapStepList: List of steps for the scroll map

translationManagement.homepage.title: Title of the homepage
translationManagement.mapPage.introContent: Introduction of the selection panel in the map (before charts and sources)
